tp:docstring.p: User object encapsulates the necessary details of a group account including adding, updating and deleting group.

signal.name: unregistered
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when the group dbus object is destroyed and is no more usable.

method.name: addGroup
method.tp:docstring: Adds the group info to the group's account database.

method.name: deleteGroup
method.tp:docstring: Deletes the group info from the group's account database

method.name: updateGroup
method.tp:docstring: Updates the group info into the group's account database

method.name: addMember
method.tp:docstring: Adds a user to the group accounts' database

arg.name: uid
arg.tp:docstring: UID of the user to be added to the group

arg.name: add_as_admin
arg.tp:docstring: flag to indicate whether add the user to the group as admin or not.

method.name: deleteMember
method.tp:docstring: Deletes a user from the group's account database

arg.name: uid
arg.tp:docstring: UID of the user to be deleted from the group

property.name: grouptype
property.tp:docstring: Type of the group. Type can be system(1) and user(2)

property.name: secret
property.tp:docstring: secret used for accessing the group data
